title: Fitna the movie - AVI and FLV format
description:
Fitna the movie.

File list:

fitna.flv (original file)
fitna.avi (converted file, so you don\\\\\\\&#039;t need flvplayer)
readme.txt (tribute to TPB)

As found on http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=ee4_1206625795
